name: Planty
description:
A side project I'm working on. It's a basic metroidvania game

(as of now it's basicaly just a proof of concept for the kind of movement and enemy types I'm going for)

Features:

  • Run, jump and cling onto walls, allowing wall-jumps and wall climbs
  • Fire quick shots with the weapon or charge up for a more powerful shot
  • Hold crouch + jump to activate boost mode, allowing faster movement and can be discharged into a super charge shot or super jump (up + jump)
  • Fight bosses that involve both combat and puzzle solving
  • Secrets can be revealed with light
